channel.title: I added Dr. Breen to the game.
channel.description:
Another minor cameo of a HL2 character.
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=834953461&searchtext=[/url]
I spent about an hour on this for a 5-second appearance.
Enjoy.
